title: Slow load time for mac
body:
Hello all. 
For the past few days, since the latest patch, every time i finish champ select, i get a white screen, followed by an insanely slow load time, causing my computer to be unable to tab out. In the past my computer has always loaded extremely quickly. I run league on a mac. Is this a bug? 

Thanks in advance.

replies.body: Same thing is happening to me...definitely needs to fix this bug.
